cast.name: 布林娅·约比亚娜多蒂尔 Brynja Jónbjarnardóttir

introduction: The Rabbit Hole is a surreal fable that features a young girl traveling through beautiful terrain full of strange and bizarre creatures.Set in an undefined future, or maybe past, the film evokes something of Luc Besson's early work The Last Battle, melded with a touch of the visual absurdity of Spike Milligan's post-apocalyptic classic The Bed-Sitting Room. Here, the first-tim...
